description:
The mystery of Leviathan is close to being solved! Time to look back on how Haru and the others met, and the hardest battles they`ve faced, while steeling our nerves to face off against Leviathan!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Boku ga Shujinkou!? Gacchimon to no Deai
I`m a Protagonist?! My First Meeting with Gatchmon!
ボクが主人公!? ガッチモンとの出会い
